title: Court order issued on protest march scheduled for tomorrow in Fort
body_lines: The Fort Magistrate Court today issued an order against a protest march scheduled to be held tomorrow, police said
The police obtained the court order preventing protestors from entering York Street, Bank Street or Chatham Street.
According to the court order, the protesters are not allowed to cause any inconvenience to the general public or vehicular movement in the Fort Police Division tomorrow.
The order issued following an request made by the OIC of the Fort Police.
